mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AIRLINE_INFO WHERE AIRLINE_CODE LIKE #{airlineCode}

SELECT * FROM AIRLINE_INFO a JOIN SEAT_GRADE s ON a.AIRLINE_CODE = s.AIRLINE_CODE WHERE TO_DATE(DEPART_TIME, 'HH24:MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{departTimeLeft}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#{departTimeRight}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE (ARRIVAL_TIME, 'HH24:MI') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{arrivalTimeLeft}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#{arrivalTimeRight}, 'HH24:MI') AND SEAT_PRICE BETWEEN 0 AND #{maxPrice} AND DEPART_LOC LIKE #{departLoc} AND ARRIVAL_LOC LIKE #{arrivalLoc}
ORDER BY FLIGHT_TIME
ORDER BY FLIGHT_TIME DESC
ORDER BY SEAT_PRICE
ORDER BY SEAT_PRICE DESC
